comment.author: 8108294@N05
comment._content: Interesting. As to date, the cars at lower left suggest the late 1940s. That long rectangular portion of the Domain at left is now rather altered due to construction of the Cahill Expressway and re-landscaping.

comment._content: Thats not the part they are planning to roof over.

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: Manly ferries at the Kurraba Point base off the stern of the moored steamer, from left Dee Why or Curl Curl, Bellubera and South Steyne side-on.
